mapper.select: select mdate from (select trunc(mdate) mdate from match where lcode = #{lcode} and trunc(sysdate)-trunc(mdate) < 0 group by trunc(mdate) order by abs(trunc(sysdate)-trunc(mdate)) asc, trunc(mdate) desc) where rownum = 1

select distinct trunc(mdate) mdate from match where trunc(mdate) in (select mdate from (select #{middleDay}-trunc(mdate), trunc(mdate) mdate from match where #{middleDay}-trunc(mdate) < 0 and lcode = #{lcode} group by #{middleDay}-trunc(mdate), trunc(mdate) order by #{middleDay}-trunc(mdate) desc) where rownum <= 3) or trunc(mdate) in (select mdate from (select #{middleDay}-trunc(mdate), trunc(mdate) mdate from match where #{middleDay}-trunc(mdate) >= 0 and lcode = #{lcode} group by #{middleDay}-trunc(mdate), trunc(mdate) order by #{middleDay}-trunc(mdate) asc) where rownum <= 4) order by trunc(mdate)
select count(*) from match where lcode=#{lcode} and trunc(mdate) = #{mdate}

select mcode, lcode, mdate, mround, mstatus, ccode_home, ccode_away, homescore, awayscore, cname_short_h, emblem_h, cname_short_a, emblem_a from (select rownum rnum, V.* from (select M.*, Ch.cname_short cname_short_h, Ch.emblem emblem_h, Ca.cname_short cname_short_a, Ca.emblem emblem_a from match M, club Ch, club Ca where M.ccode_home = Ch.ccode and M.ccode_away = Ca.ccode and M.lcode = #{lcode} and to_char(trunc(M.mdate),'yyyy-mm-dd') = #{day} order by mdate) V) where rnum >= #{start} and rnum <= #{end}

select M.*, Ch.cname_short cname_short_h, Ca.cname_short cname_short_a from match M, club Ch, club Ca where M.ccode_home = Ch.ccode and M.ccode_away = Ca.ccode and M.lcode = #{lcode} and to_char(mdate,'yyyy') = #{seasoncode} order by M.mdate desc, mround desc
